This app is currently not receiving the heart rate from your heart rate device. Make sure:\n -That your heart rate device is turned on and is transmitting the heart rate.\n -That you have not changed your heart rate device. If you have changed it please set your new device through the advanced settings section of this app

This app is now monitoring your heart rate. You may now move to another screen on your phone. This app will continue monitoring your heart rate even if you switch off your phone screen. If you want to stop this app come back to this screen and hit the "Stop" button

This app may not work as intended because:
 -You may have not entered any phone numbers that may be alerted in an emergency.
 -Or you may not have enabled SMS or dial for that number.
 -Unless you are testing the app make sure that you set up phone numbers in the Settings->Contacts section. The dial and SMS checkboxes besides the phone numbers must be checked.
